com.netflix.governator.configuration

Class CompositeConfigurationProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.governator.configuration.CompositeConfigurationProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LifecycleConfigurationProviders

    public class CompositeConfigurationProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigurationProvider
    A configuration provider that composites multiple providers. The first provider (in order) that has a configuration set (via has(ConfigurationKey) is used to return the configuration.
